meanings.definition: The act of fishing for trout.
meanings.sent1: During the troutings, we caught many fish by the river.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy troutings with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The troutings turned into a competition to see who could catch the biggest fish.
meanings.sent4: His patience during the troutings was as steady as a rock in the river.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the river during the troutings was calming and peaceful.

meanings.definition: A group of trout swimming together.
meanings.sent1: We saw a beautiful school of troutings in the clear stream.
meanings.sent2: The troutings moved gracefully as a synchronized team in the water.
meanings.sent3: The troutings seemed to be having a race downstream.
meanings.sent4: The shimmering colors of the troutings were like a moving rainbow in the river.
meanings.sent5: The troutings darted playfully in the water, creating a mesmerizing sight.
